dmca.title: UNAUTHORIZED USE OF NATASHA YI'S IMAGE
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: David Caplan [mailto:dcaplan@kmwlaw.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, November 01, 2006 5:47 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: UNAUTHORIZED USE OF NATASHA YI'S IMAGE
Subject: UNAUTHORIZED USE OF NATASHA YI'S IMAGE


David K. Caplan
Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP
9720 Wilshire Blvd., Penthouse Suite
Beverly Hills, CA 90212
(310) 248-3830
Fax:  (310) 860-0363

November 1, 2006


VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL

Everyones Internet
390 Benmar Suite 200
Houston, TX 77060

customerservice@networksolutions.com; abuse@ev1servers.net;
admin@ev1.net

        Re:         UNAUTHORIZED USE OF NATASHA YI'S IMAGE
        http://www.adultfanclubs.net
                        
Dear Sir or Madam:

        This letter is being written to you on behalf of our client
Natasha Yi.  Ms. Yi is the owner of rights of publicity and privacy in
her name and image. 

        Notwithstanding this, it has come to our attention that a web
site located at
"http://www.adultfanclubs.net/pseek/Adults_Only/Celebrities/Centerfolds/
Y/Yi,044_Natasha/," for which you are a service provider, links
unauthorized reproductions of Ms. Yi's image.  The distribution of these
images, as well as the use of Ms. Yi's name in metatags and/or use of
Ms. Yi's name to increase traffic on this web site, violates Ms. Yi's
rights of publicity and privacy. Further, based on the fact that some of
the images on the above-referenced web site appear to have been
illegally copied from copyrighted photographs, this web site may also
infringe the rights of various copyright owners.

        On behalf of Ms. Yi, we request your assistance in the removal
of all unauthorized depictions of Ms. Yi from this web site and any
other sites for which you act as an Internet service provider.  As you
may know, failure to remove such infringing content from this web site
may expose you to liability for contributory infringement of Ms. Yi's
rights.  Please contact me to discuss this matter at your earliest
convenience.
 
        Nothing in this letter shall be construed as a waiver or
relinquishment of any right or remedy possessed by Natasha Yi or any
other affected party, all of which are expressly reserved.

Very truly yours,
        /s/
David K. Caplan
